data.comment: The match is underway in Kashiwa.
Can Oita capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 2, Yuichi Nishimura awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 3, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 5, Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Oita, close to Kashiwa's area.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashiwa.
Oita's Kohei Isa breaks free at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Oita have an attacking throw-in.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Oita throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 13, In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Kashiwa.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 17, Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 18, Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Kashiwa.
Oita are pushing forward but Yuji Hoshi's finish is wide of the goal.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Oita drive forward but Kaoru Takayama is judged offside.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In the minute 22, Ryosuke Tone for Oita has been booked by Yuichi Nishimura and receives a first yellow card.
Cristiano for Kashiwa drives towards goal at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
In the minute 28, Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Oita in the half of Kashiwa.
Oita to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Throw-in for Oita at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Oita in the half of Kashiwa.
Yoshinori Suzuki (Oita) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 35, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Oita's half.
In the minute 39, Can Kashiwa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
Yuichi Nishimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Yuichi Nishimura signals a throw-in for Kashiwa, close to Oita's area.
Kashiwa drives forward and Cristiano gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Kashiwa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 43, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa just outside Oita's area.
Tomoki Iwata is booked for the away team.
Kashiwa's Cristiano misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Oita at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Yuichi Nishimura will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Kashiwa.
In Kashiwa Oita drive forward through Yuya Takazawa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, Yuichi Nishimura blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
In the minute 47, Kashiwa's Hiroto Goya scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Cristiano instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Kashiwa's Hayato Nakama gets in a shot on goal at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Oita.
In the minute 54, Free kick in a good position for Oita!
Jiro Kamata (Kashiwa) has received a first yellow card.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick Kashiwa.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Tomohiro Katanosaka (Oita) is making a first substitution, with Tatsuya Tanaka replacing Kaoru Takayama.
Tomohiro Katanosaka is making the team's second substitution at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium with Yuto Misao replacing Ryosuke Tone.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Oita throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 63, Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Oita in the half of Kashiwa.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Yuki Kobayashi is on a sub for Ryosuke Maeda for Oita.
Yamato Machida is replacing Kazushi Mitsuhira for Oita at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
In the minute 73, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashiwa.
Cristiano gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Oita in their own half.
The away team replace Kohei Isa with Kei Chinen.
Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Kashiwa.
In the minute 78, Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Oita have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 80, Tatsuya Tanaka for Oita drives towards goal at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kashiwa make their first substitution with Yuta Kamiya replacing Hayato Nakama.
Goal! Tomoki Iwata levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 84, Yuya Takazawa with an assist there.
Kei Chinen gets his shot on target but fails to score for Oita.
The home team have replaced Hiroto Goya with Michael Olunga. This is the second substitution made today by Nelsinho Baptista.
In the minute 86, Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
Masatoshi Mihara of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Oita advance rapidly upfield but Yuichi Nishimura blows for offside.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Oita throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Oita are coming forward and Yamato Machida gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Sankyo Frontier Kashiwa Stadium.
Kashiwa are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Kashiwa.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Yuichi Nishimura.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Yuki Kobayashi (Oita) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
